questions_1.question: Which of the following are the purposes of the distribution and control subsystems?
Options: Initiate the starting process from the cockpit
Supply electrical current to the air starter valve to energize it
Transmit rotary motion of the ATS to the AGB
Control the buildup of air pressure within the air starter valve
questions_1.correctFeedback:
That's Correct!

You have chosen the correct option.
questions_1.InCorrectFeedback:
That's Incorrect!

You have chosen the wrong option. The valid answer is "Initiate the starting process from the cockpit, Supply electrical current to the air starter valve to energize it, Transmit rotary motion of the ATS to the AGB, Control the buildup of air pressure within the air starter valve"
questions_1.partialFeedback:
That's Incorrect!

The valid answer is "Initiate the starting process from the cockpit, Supply electrical current to the air starter valve to energize it, Transmit rotary motion of the ATS to the AGB, Control the buildup of air pressure within the air starter valve"
